title: Privacy Policy
introduction: At Innovate QA Events, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or attend our events.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect information about you in various ways, including:

items.subtitle: Personal Data
items.description: When you register for events, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us, we may collect personally identifiable information such as your name, email address, phone number, company name, and job title.

items.subtitle: Payment Information
items.description: When purchasing tickets, we collect payment information through our secure payment processors. We do not store complete credit card numbers on our servers.

items.subtitle: Usage Data
items.description: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, pages visited, and time spent on pages.

items.subtitle: Event Data
items.description: During events, we may collect information about sessions attended, networking connections made, and feedback provided.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.description: Send you event updates, newsletters, and promotional materials
Improve our website, events, and services
Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We may share your information with:

items.description: Event sponsors (with your consent) for networking purposes
Service providers who assist in operating our website and events
Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

items.description: Access the personal information we hold about you
Request deletion of your personal information

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at privacy@innovateqaevents.com or by mail at our address listed on the Contact page.
